medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute-onset post-prandial epigastric and RUQ pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started at 1 AM this morning, following a heavy meal the night before. The patient reports severe sharp pain that woke her up, associated with nausea and subjective fevers/chills, but no emesis. The patient denies ever having had this pain before.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. High Blood Pressure 2. Hypercholesterolemia 3. Sleep disordered breathing 4. Left Hand Carpal Tunnel Syndrome. Past surgeries include hysterectomy, tonsillectomy, exploratory surgery, and right knee repair.
